short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays weather data based on user's location.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simply displays your weather temperature and wind speed across all your tabs.

- Display window is movable (drag and position)
- Display window turns transparent when your mouse is not over it
- Refreshes every 10 minutes for accurate data
- NEEDS location permission on chrome to work
